title: Ticket #5617: [EC2] need to recognize "InvalidSpotInstanceRequestID.NotFound"
description: When we encounter the "InvalidSpotInstanceRequestID.NotFound" error from AWS, we should probably do something cleverer than put the job on hold and tell the user. This almost certainly means that the spot instance request was purged between our last status update and when we tried to something (whatever just failed) with it, and we should react appropriately. (Including checking, if we can, to see if the vanished spot request started an instance while we weren't looking.)
creator: tlmiller
